definition.featurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="feature_container" deletable="false" x="589" y="232"><value name="feature"><block type="feature_tree_simple"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="type">acacia</field><field name="base_height">5</field><field name="height_variation_a">3</field><field name="height_variation_b">6</field><field name="force_dirt">FALSE</field><field name="ignore_vines">TRUE</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This block represents an acacia tree, and should generate during the VEGETAL_DECORATION stage.</comment><value name="dirt"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">Blocks.DIRT#0</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is the block that will be placed under the trunk</comment></block></value><value name="trunk"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">CUSTOM:DarkwoodLog</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is the block used for the trunk</comment></block></value><value name="foliage"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">CUSTOM:DarkwoodLeaves</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is the block used for the leaves</comment></block></value><value name="root_placer"><block type="root_placer_none"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Acacia trees don't have roots</comment></block></value></block></value><next><block type="placement_in_square"><next><block type="placement_heightmap"><field name="heightmap">MOTION_BLOCKING</field><next><block type="placement_count"><value name="count"><block type="int_provider_constant"><field name="value">6</field></block></value><next><block type="placement_biome_filter"></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
